description: This contains episode information pertaining to anticoagulation therapy.   Most fields are accessed through the anticoagulation enrollment form. There is a corresponding encounter table, PAT_ENC_ANTICOAG.  ***Do not assume that all patients on anticoagulation therapy have a record in this table.  The best way to determine anticoagulation episodes is by using the SUM_BLK_TYPE_ID in the EPISODE table.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the episode of care record.  NOTE: This table is filtered to include only non-inpatient episodes.  Inpatient episode data can be found in the table IP_EPISODE_LINK (first released with system 2002).

columns.name: INR_GOAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Data item to store the INR goal, which is a range, for this episode of anticoagulation


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


1.5-2.0


1.5-2.5


2.0-3.0


2.5-3.5


3.0-4.0


3.0-4.5


3.5-4.5

columns.name: RESPONSIBLE_HIP_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: TARGET_END_DATE
columns.description: Target end date of anticoagulation therapy

columns.name: LAB_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient's preferred INR lab location


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Clinic Lab


Outside Lab


Anticoagulation Clinic


Home Draw

columns.name: PREFERRED_LAB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the lab that is the patient's preferred lab for international normalized ratio (INR) tests. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_LLB table.

columns.name: DISCONT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for discontinuing the anticoagulation therapy.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NEXT_INR_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient should return for their next INR check.

columns.name: INDEFINITE_TREAT_YN
columns.description:
Specifies if the patient's treatment is indefinite.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID
columns.description: Referring provider for an anticoagulation episode
